articles.title: Welcome to SarvadarshiTarang!
articles.description: Your free, serverless news app powered by GitHub. Start publishing news articles with zero hosting costs.
articles.author: SarvadarshiTarang Team
articles.content:
Welcome to SarvadarshiTarang, your modern news platform that runs entirely for free!

## What Makes This Special?

This is not just another news app. It's a complete serverless architecture that costs you absolutely nothing to run:

- ‚úÖ GitHub - Free hosting for content and code - ‚úÖ GitHub Pages - Free CDN for your app and JSON feed - ‚úÖ GitHub Actions - Free automation (2000 minutes/month) - ‚úÖ Flutter - Build once, deploy everywhere

## How It Works

1. Write articles in Markdown format 2. Commit to your GitHub repository 3. Automated conversion to JSON feed 4. Instant updates in your app

No servers, no databases, no monthly bills!

## Getting Started

Check out the documentation in the repository to start publishing your first article. It's as simple as creating a markdown file!

Ready to revolutionize news publishing? Start creating content today!

articles.title: Breaking News: New AI Model Breakthrough
articles.description: Researchers announce groundbreaking AI with unprecedented capabilities

image.alt: Breaking News: New AI Model Breakthrough

articles.author: Tech Reporter
articles.content:
# Breaking News: New AI Model Breakthrough

In a stunning development that could reshape multiple industries, researchers today unveiled a revolutionary artificial intelligence model with capabilities previously thought impossible.

## The Announcement

The new model, developed by a team of researchers, represents a significant leap forward in AI technology. Early testing shows:

- 50% improvement in accuracy - 10x faster processing speed - Lower power consumption - Better generalization across tasks

## What This Means

Industry experts are calling this a watershed moment. Dr. Sarah Chen, a leading AI researcher, comments:

> "This breakthrough could accelerate innovation across healthcare, transportation, and education. We're looking at practical applications within months, not years."

## Key Features

1. Improved Reasoning: Better handles complex multi-step problems 2. Reduced Bias: More equitable across demographic groups 3. Open Source: Code will be made available to researchers worldwide 4. Energy Efficient: Runs on standard hardware

## Timeline

- Today: Initial announcement - Next week: Detailed white paper release - March: Open source availability - June: Commercial deployment expected

## Expert Reactions

The response from the tech community has been overwhelmingly positive:

- OpenAI: "Game-changing advancement" - Google: "Validates our research direction" - Academic institutions: Race to implement new techniques

---

## Read More

For detailed technical analysis and implications, [read the full article on our blog ‚Üí](https://yourblog.com/ai-breakthrough)

This is an in-shorts summary. Find the complete analysis with expert interviews and data visualizations on our blog.

articles.title: Sundarakanda Abhiyana for 5 Lakh counts
articles.description: You heard it right from Feb 2026 to Feb 2027, Sundarakanda abhiyana to complete 5 lakh counts
articles.author: Madhavarao
articles.content:
## For social welfare and initiative by Kudali Arya Akshobhya Matha

Sri Raghuvijaya Teertharu of Shree Kudli Aarya Akshobhya Teerth Matha has called for 5 Lakh counts of Sundarakanda Parayana by devotees

### Details

- ‚ö° Period - Feb 2026 to Feb 2027 - üé® Purpose - For social welfare and bless sajjanas with Sadhana siddhi

#### Your role - üîî Enroll yourself to the group - üíæ Save your chanting count for a week - üîñ Report the count with your name

articles.title: Team Collaboration Made Easy
articles.description: Learn how multiple team members can contribute articles through GitHub pull requests, with approval workflows built-in.
articles.author: Editorial Team
articles.content:
## Multi-Author Publishing Platform

SarvadarshiTarang supports collaborative content creation with built-in approval workflows.

### How Team Collaboration Works

1. Team Members create articles in their branches 2. Submit pull requests for review 3. Reviewers check content, suggest edits 4. Approve and merge to publish instantly

### Benefits

- üìù Version Control - Complete history of all changes - üë• Multi-Author - Unlimited team members - ‚úÖ Quality Control - Review before publish - üîÑ Easy Revisions - Roll back if needed

### No Special Software Needed

Your team can contribute using: - GitHub web interface (no coding required) - Desktop GitHub app - Command line (for developers)

Perfect for news organizations, blogs, and content teams!

articles.title: Mobile-First News Experience
articles.description: Beautiful native-like experience on both Android and iOS, with smooth animations and offline support coming soon.
articles.author: Product Team
articles.content:
## Built for Mobile Devices

SarvadarshiTarang is designed with mobile users as the primary audience.

### Native-Like Performance

- ‚ö° Fast Loading - Optimized images and code - üé® Beautiful UI - Material Design on Android, Cupertino on iOS - üì± Responsive - Adapts to all screen sizes - üåô Dark Mode - Easy on the eyes

### Features

#### Share Functionality - Take screenshots of articles - Share to WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook - Copy links instantly

#### Reading Experience - Clean, distraction-free interface - Category-based filtering - Quick read time estimates - Pull-to-refresh

#### Coming Soon - üîî Push Notifications (Firebase) - üíæ Offline Reading - üîñ Bookmarks - üîç Search

Download from Play Store or App Store soon!
